description: Looking for six actors to perform in a staged reading of a new play, MADAMADAM. Must be local to the area and able to come to Saratoga for rehearsals and performance.
RiffRaff NYC and Rogue Theater Festival invite playwrights to submit original short plays for our fourth festival showcase, I’m In Love With An Immigrant.

CONTRACT:
12 Rehearsals and 4 performances
$200 stipend
non-union

PREPARATION:
Please email us a video (or link to a video) of you singing. If you play an instrument, please send us a video of you playing it.
In your email, please briefly introduce yourself.
If you have a role(s) you're particularly interested in, please say so.

PERSONNEL:
Will review submissions:

Director, Madeline Wall
Music Director, Lily White
Book and Lyrics Writer, Sarah Safford
Composer, Sean Ivy

ABOUT THIS PROJECT:
EcoDisaster in the Hundred Acre Wood

Do you love working with kids? Do you want to pick up extra babysitting gigs that fit into your schedule? HeyCurated is a third-party back-up care provider and we are looking for experienced nannies and babysitters who want to pick up extra work as a back-up caregiver in Manhattan, Brooklyn and Queens.
Seasonal Staff for Greenbrier Valley Theatre

Please apply using the link:
https://jobs.ashbyhq.com/dreamthree/24b0c5a6-d77f-4d0b-a65e-e12824035e91?utm_source=Playbill

ROLE OVERVIEW

Spirit of the Game: The Ultimate Musical is seeking a Scenic Projection Designer to join our creative team for a non-equity showcase production at Asylum NYC. Rehearsals begin April 22, 2026 and run each weekday from 10 am to 3 pm through May 8. Tech and dress rehearsals are planned for May 12 and 13 with performances running May 14-17. The Scenic Projection Designer would join production meetings before the start of the rehearsal schedule for planning and initial design discussions, and be available for some portion of the rehearsal schedule to adapt and refine designs given the developmental nature of this new work. This new musical blends athleticism, humor, and heart, and we’re looking for a designer who can help build a dynamic visual world through projection including scenes on the island of Crete in Greece and athletic fields in different locations where the sport of ultimate frisbee will come to life.

SUMMARY
Hale Centre Theatre is building a pool of experienced automation professionals interested in operating and maintaining our state-of-the-art Automation systems for our award-winning productions.
Bespoke Theatricals is currently seeking a DECK CARPENTER to join the National Touring production of BACK TO THE FUTURE immediately.

To audition for the New York Renaissance Faire you will need to submit a recording to the New York Renaissance Faire 2026 Audition Form. Submissions will be closed on Monday March 16th, 2026 at 12:00 PM. Callback Invitations will be sent by Wednesday March 25th. Callbacks are scheduled for Saturday March 28th and Sunday March 29th. You will not be considered for the fight based roles if you are not invited or are unable to attend the fight call on Saturday March 28th in New York City in person.

TITANIQUE, the Broadway production playing at the St. James Theatre, is seeking candidates for a Fellowship in Company and General Management.

***$16/hr regular wage, $1/regular wage hour worked end-of-season bonus when contract completed. Character Tour Guide / Support Staff are eligible for tips. Guides MUST be able to arrive in Skagway by April 23rd - Training begins April 25th, 2026; Contract End Date is Sept 30th, 2026. Subsidized housing is $300/month, double occupancy, deducted from the paycheck. Pets are not allowed in company housing.***

The Palace Theatre in Manchester, NH, is seeking a strong singer-pianist who captures the sound and spirit of Carole King for an intimate tribute concert performance. Performer must accompany themselves on piano and embody the warmth, storytelling, and soulful style of her music.

JAGGED LITTLE PILL – COLORADO SPRINGS FINE ARTS CENTER – ROLE OF FRANKIE

Producer/Theatre Company: NETworks Presentations
Book: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, Robert Lopez
Music: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, Robert Lopez
Lyrics: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, Robert Lopez
Original Director: Trey Parker, Casey Nicholaw
Original Choreographer: Casey Nicholaw
Tour Director and Choreographer: Jennifer Werner
Music Supervisor: Stephen Oremus
Music Director: Justin Mendoza
Casting Director: Carrie Gardner
Audition Date(s): February 17, 2026
Rehearsal Date(s): o/a February 23, 2026

THE BOOK OF MORMON is committed to an equitable, inclusive, and accessible casting process and encourages gender diverse and color-conscious casting. Performers of all ethnic and cultural backgrounds, gender identities, and abilities are encouraged to apply.

RWS GLOBAL is hosting auditions in Chicago, IL on February 18 seeking SINGERS & DANCERS for our full cruise line and theme park portfolio. Performance opportunities include: HOLLAND AMERICA LINE, MSC CRUISES, AZAMARA CRUISES, MEDORA MUSICAL, HERSHEYPARK and more.
Ready to bring the energy and make a room explode with excitement?

Silverwood Theme Park seeks comedic actors for the upcoming 2025 season. Silverwood is located in Athol, ID, just 25 minutes from the beautiful vacation town of Coeur d'Alene. Performers will be in our beloved train show as Rangers giving a tour of the Silverwood backforest.

From the people behind “Garfeld: The Musical (A Garfield Parody),” comes a brand-new, unhinged parody musical. Randy McDandy, the beloved clown mascot behind fast food chain McDandys, bites off more than he can chew when he attempts to manage one of his restaurants in the dangerous Slumsville. He’s shocked to discover that his restaurant once bursting with color and fun has been turned into a cold, corporate environment with no trace of the charm it once had. Randy vows to return McDandys back to its former glory, battling the capitalist heads up in corporate, as well as the cynicism of a modern world that sees clowns as scary. Along the way, we meet other colorful friends and foes, including the evil villain Robber-Burger and his sidekick Dandy Boy, Pingas (the big purple narrator, a la Grimace), Amber & Donovere (the mopey teens working at McDandys), Fran (the unlucky manager of the Slumsville McDandys, and a love interest for Randy), and many more! It's a ridiculous parody served with a side of earnestness and heart.
SUNCOAST BROADWAY - MISS SAIGON- IMMEDIATE REPLACEMENT MIMI
